gobblin.converter.filter

Class AvroSchemaFieldRemover

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.converter.filter.AvroSchemaFieldRemover

  • public class AvroSchemaFieldRemover
extends Object
    A class that removes specific fields from a (possibly recursive) Avro schema.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AvroSchemaFieldRemover(String fieldNames) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Schema removeFields(Schema schema) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AvroSchemaFieldRemover

        public AvroSchemaFieldRemover(String fieldNames)
        Parameters:
        fieldNames - Field names to be removed from the Avro schema. Contains comma-separated fully-qualified field names, e.g., "header.memberId,mobileHeader.osVersion".

    • Method Detail

      • removeFields

        public Schema removeFields(Schema schema)
        Parameters:
        schema - The Avro schema where the specified fields should be removed from.
        Returns:
        A new Avro schema with the specified fields removed.
